mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, mobile, user_type, password, nickname, last_login_ip, last_login_date, status, last_login_device, company_id, parent_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, surname,name, card_no, email, country_code,level
mapper.update: update t_user set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update t_user set parent_id = '',status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@User_Identify} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update t_user set parent_id = '',status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@User_Identify} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and parent_id = #{upId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.data_status, a.desp, a.mobile, a.password, a.nickname, a.last_login_ip, a.last_login_date, a.status, a.last_login_device, a.company_id, a.parent_id, a.attachment_id_1, a.attachment_id_2, a.attachment_id_3, a.surname,a.name, a.card_no, email,a.level, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as attachment_id_1_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',c.attachment_link) as attachment_id_2_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',d.attachment_link) as attachment_id_3_link from t_user a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id left join t_attachment c on a.attachment_id_2 = c.id left join t_attachment d on a.attachment_id_3 = d.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, mobile, user_type, password, nickname, last_login_ip, last_login_date, status, last_login_device, company_id, parent_id, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, attachment_id_3, surname,name, card_no, email, country_code,level) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lastLoginDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{level,jdbcType=INTEGER})
